Dear All, Good day!
Pls pps suitable biz for our lady and add czk@fz-highton.com in your address book，
and pls contact me on WeChat(+86-18054994220) or skype(live:1203957315)
MV XIN HAI TONG 16 2008 56842DWT 4X30MT CRANE WL OPEN DAR ES SALAAM, TANZANIA 2ND-8TH/SEP 2024 IAGW WP.
BOD: LSFO ABT 550-650MT . MGO ABT  100-110 MT.
LAST 3 CGO :  WHEAT/GENERAL CARGO/NICKEL ORE
TRY ANY
1. NAME: MV XIN HAI TONG 16
2. TYPE: GEARED, SINGLE DECK BULK CARRIER
3. BUILT: 2008
4. FLAG: PANAMA
5. GRT/NRT INTERNATIONAL: 33000/19266
6. LOA / LBP / BEAM / DEPTH MOUDED: 189.99M / 185.00M / 32.26M / 18.00M
7. LOADING INFORMATION BSS SW (S.G.1.025)
LOADLINE DEADWEIGHT    DRAFT       FREEBOARD     DISPLACEMENT
SUMMER:  56842        12.800M     5.200M       67680
WINTER:   55272        12.533M     5.467M       66110
TROPICAL:  58416        13.067M     4.933M       69254
TPC AT SUMMER DRAFT: 58.8
8. CARGO GEARS: 4 CRANES ON DECK SWL 30TON UNDER HOOK/ 24MT WITH GRABS ATTACHED
– WORKING RADIUS 4 TO 25 MTS AND 4 GRABS OF 14 CUMT.
9. H/H: 5/5
10. TYPE OF HATCH COVERS: FOLDING TYPE, HYDRAULIC SYSTEM
11. GRAIN & BALE CAPACITY (INCL HATCH WAYS)
HOLD WISE   BALE (M3)      GRAIN (M3)
HOLD 1      12300        13009
HOLD 2      14700        15333
HOLD 3      14000        14553
HOLD 4      14700        15333
HOLD 5      12500        13404
------------------------------------------------
TOTAL        68200        71632
12. SPEED/CONSUMPTION :
ECO:
BALLAST: ABT 12 KNOTS ON ABT 20.5 MT VLSFO + 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN:     ABT 11.5 KNOTS ON ABT 23.0 MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
AT PORT:
IDLE：          ABT 2.0 MTS VLSFO + 0.1 MTS LSMGO PER DAY
WORKING：ABT 4.5 MTS VLSFO + 0.1MTS LSMGO  PER DAY
ADDITIONAL ABT 4.5 MT VLSFO DAILY FOR BALLAST/DEBALLAST
ALWAYS PLUS EXTRA ABT 1.5MT FOR WINTER/COLD SEASON IF TEMPERATURE IS LESS THAN 10℃
“ABT” IS DEFINED AS -0.5 KNOT ON THE SPEED AND +5% ON THE CONSUMPTION FIGURES
(A) AVERAGE SPEED AND AVERAGE CONSUMPTION TO BE CALCULATED FROM SEA BUOY TO SEA BUOY EXCLUDING PERIODS OF SLOW STEAMING
ON CHARTERERS ORDER OR FOR REASONS OF SAFETY OR STANDING BY OR ASSISTING ANOTHER VESSEL IN DISTRESS.
(B) SPEED AND CONSUMPTION BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS OF UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT HEIGHT MAX 1.25M)WITH NO NEGATIVE SWELL NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, MINIMUM 24 HOURS STEAMING TIME, MAX SEA SURFACE TEMPERATURE OF 26 DEGREES CELCIUS, EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WE ATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED
(C) THE EFFECTS OF CURRENTS DURING PERIODS OF GOOD WEATHER ARE TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM THE PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT.
(D)VESL MAY BURN SMALL QTYS OF LSMGO WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW&NARROW WATERS ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS/IN HEAVY WEATHER/CANAL/RIVER/BALLAST/DEBALLAST ETC.
(E) 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE  TO BE APPLIED FOR SPEED ASSESSMENT, 5% ALLOWANCE FOR OWNER TO BE APPLIED TO BUNKER CONSUMPTION.
(F) BUNKER SAVING TO OFFSET ANY TIME LOST AND VICE VERSA.
(G) BUNKER SUPPLIED BEING OF ISO8217:2017 (E)  SPECIFICATION, OR 2010, IF 2017 IS NOT AVAILABLE
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
TKS & B.RGDS!
Zack Cao
